text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>In der Hoch-Obrigkeitl. Buchtruckerey zu Bern und folgende Bücher in gar geringem Preise zu haben, als: 1. <BIBL><AUTHOR>J. H Ringieri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>CX. Conciones de Cena Dominic.</TITLE> <VOLUME>3. Vol.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1680</YEAR>. Das Exemplar in albo achthalben <PRIZE>bz.</PRIZE></BIBL> 2. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rissenii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Summa Theolog.</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1703</YEAR>. 10. Batzen, <PRIZE>10. Batzen</PRIZE> und auff Schreib-papier <PRIZE>14. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 3. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rodolphi</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Compend. Theol. Christ</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern</PLACE><YEAR>1713</YEAR>. 8 Batzen. <PRIZE>8 Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 4. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Altmanns</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Carechetischer Leichter und Rauchwerck, d. i. Erklarung und Gebet über den Heidelberger Catechismum,</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern,</PLACE> <YEAR>1711</YEAR>. mit dem Kupfer-Blatt haltet <PRIZE>15. und ein halben Bogen,</PRIZE> <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 5. <BIBL><TITLE>Biblia Piscatoris</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Rein,</PLACE> <PRIZE>15. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 6. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Seelmatters</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Ewig-bestandender Berg Zion, oder: der vest-gegründete überwindliche Gnaden-Stand der Kinder Gottes,</TITLE> gründlich vorgestellt über die Worte des 125. Psalms <FORMAT>9. 1.</FORMAT> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1704</YEAR>. <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":15,"explanation":"Corrections include fixing mis-escaped umlauts and special characters turning them into proper German diacritics, correcting the incorrect closing tag </PRICE> to </PRIZE>, normalizing spellings and diacritics (Bücher, Preis, Exemplar, Heidelberger, Erklärung, Gottes, Psalms), removing stray square-root characters that stood in for umlauts, and improving overall XML well-formedness by standardizing tag usage and word forms where it makes sense."}

parsed.explanation: Corrections include fixing mis-escaped umlauts and special characters turning them into proper German diacritics, correcting the incorrect closing tag </PRICE> to </PRIZE>, normalizing spellings and diacritics (Bücher, Preis, Exemplar, Heidelberger, Erklärung, Gottes, Psalms), removing stray square-root characters that stood in for umlauts, and improving overall XML well-formedness by standardizing tag usage and word forms where it makes sense.
